ygData.subject: Re: cloak quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s a quest for a *warm* cloak. Might not be that great at your level, but I like the Polar Bear Cloak you can buy from Karg Icebear in Everfrost Peaks (he
ygData.messageBody:
Here's a quest for a *warm* cloak. Might not be that great at your level,
but I like the Polar Bear Cloak you can buy from Karg Icebear in Everfrost
Peaks (he wanders all over, between Megan's Tower and Brandl the guard).
Give him 5pp and a polar bear skin (not ruined). It's AC5 and +15 Cold
resistance. Trick is finding Karg. People like to kill him for the stuff he
drops. :(

Operaman
Warm in the Everfrost nights
Innoruuk


----- Original Message -----
From: James <manickd@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 5:59 AM
Subject: [eqbards] cloak quest


> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> Is there a quest I can do to get a cool cloak. I need a point in the right
> direction. I al looking for one with magic qualitys! thanaks all....
>

> Magnuss of Innourkk

with the subject lol.
